topics.body: Okay, normally I hate arrogant characters. Like Gilgamesh. Gilgamesh talks a big game but in reality he probably couldn't fight his way out of a paper bag. But Jack is different. His arrogance is kind of justified. He's a REALLY good duelist and is superb at counter strategies and thinking on his toes. Yeah his attitude needs work but when you're THAT good it's kind of hard not to be arrogant.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

And in hilarity news my mom saw a trailer on television for "fifty shades of grey" and thinks it's just a romance film cause she doesn't believe that theaters would show such a movie in theaters.

"Don't watch it!  It's about bondage"
"No it's not; I read the description, it's just another romance film"
